title: Bishop Data
description: Information on bishops that provides metadata and other related information, such as source files and animations

name.description: The display name of this bishop.

src.description: The source paths to the files needed to load the bishop (in normal form).

bossSrc.description: The source paths to the files needed to load the bishop (in boss form).

animation.description: The default animation it should play when this bishop is loaded (in normal form).

bossAnimation.description: The default animation it should play when this bishop is loaded (in boss form).
